sec.title: Funding
sec.p: The TAURCAT study is a non-commercial, investigator-driven clinical trial funded by the Instituto de Salud Carlos III, Spanish Ministry of Economy (PI13/01474). The study was supported by Instituto de Salud Carlos III, Subdirección General de Redes y Centros de Investigación Cooperativa, Ministerio de Economía, Industria y Competitividad, Spanish Network for Research in Infectious Diseases (REIPI RD12/0015), co-financed by the FEDER funds/European Regional Development Fund (ERDF) 'A way to achieve Europe'. The study also received an unrestricted grant from Bionet Medical S.L., which will not have any kind of involvement in the study.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: All data generated or analysed during this study are included in the published article (and its supplementary information files).
The datasets generated and/or analysed during the current study are available from the corresponding author on reasonable request.
